overview.en: NamyChain NRCS (Namy Rapid TokenFinance Chain EcoSystem) - A new high-performance, high-security distributed network that supports big data collaboration and sharing, providing basic infrastructures of public chain. NRSC satisfies features of "quickly processing thousands of transactions", "providing revenue generation methods", "having feasible methods to add new features" and "running on mobile devices" while eliminating the armament competition of computing equipments required by traditional POW mechanism, and on this basis, provides an innovative optional consensus mechanism socket, with the idea of dynamic layering and heterogeneous redundancy to achieve rapid confirmation of transactions. At the same time, the security of the system is ensured.
overview.zh: NamyChain NRCS（Namy Rapid TokenFinance Chain EcoSystem）- 金融级高可用性分布式协作网络，提供公有链底层基础设施。NRSC满足了「快速的处理数以千记的交易量」、「提供产生收入的方法」、「有可行的方法来增加新特征」及「在可移动设备上运行」特性，同时还消除了传统的POW机制所需要的算力设备军备竞赛，并在此基础上，提供创新的选装共识机制插座，以动态分层、异构冗余的思想，达到对交易的快速确认，同时保证系统的安全性。NRCS拥有一个完善的分布式大数据协作共享机制，致力于打造创新的基于公有链技术的数据处理生态，同时能够为通过NRCS公有链技术进行数据处理提供安全保护。
